There was a legitimately fun movie underneath all the crap in Ninja Turtles. The individual fights involving The Shredder were AWESOME. Hell I actually got excited when Shredder and Splinter first fought. That shit was hype. And the final fight scene on top of the tower was fun to watch. But all that was swallowed up by the muck of bullshit and nonsense.
